sentences.sContent: He is a famous seismology expert.
sentences.sCn: 他是有名的地震学专家。

sentences.sContent: The last system also corresponds to the real time seismology.
sentences.sContent_eng: The last system also corresponds to the real time seismology.
sentences.sCn: 其中，最后一个体系即相当于实时地震学。

sentences.sContent: He had just received a doctorate in recognition of his contributions to seismology .
sentences.sContent_eng: He had just received a doctorate in recognition of his contributions to seismology .
sentences.sCn: 他刚被授予了博士头衔以表彰他对地震学作出的贡献。

remMethod.val: seism(震动) + ology(…学) → 地震学

words.tran: 地震的；因地震而引起的
地震定测法；地震学（等于seismology）
